name: API Documentation Index
what_it_does: Returns the wiki index with all available documentation categories
when_to_use: Call this first when learning about the API. Shows all categories and their URLs.
how_to_use: Send GET request. No authentication required. Returns index of categories.

name: Category Documentation
what_it_does: Returns all endpoints for a specific category
when_to_use: After getting the index, call the URL of the category you want to explore.
how_to_use: Send the category ID (kebab-case) in the URL.

name: All Endpoints Documentation
what_it_does: Returns all API endpoints from all categories at once
when_to_use: When you need the complete API documentation in a single request
how_to_use: Send GET request. Returns all endpoints grouped by category.

name: Export as Markdown
what_it_does: Returns the complete API documentation in Markdown format
when_to_use: When you want to generate static documentation or export for external use
how_to_use: Send GET request. Returns Markdown-formatted API documentation.
